name: handsontable-multi-select
description: Handsontable editor and renderer for multi-select cells
author: Orestis Rodriguez <orestis@orestisrodriguez.com>

scripts.prepublishOnly: mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && babel lib/multi-select.js > dist/js/handsontable-multi-select.js && lessc lib/multi-select.less dist/css/handsontable-multi-select.css
